arguments.name: [radius]
arguments.description: radius of the torus. Defaults to 50.

arguments.name: [tubeRadius]
arguments.description: radius of the tube. Defaults to 10.

arguments.name: [detailX]
arguments.description: number of edges that form the hole. Defaults to 24.

arguments.name: [detailY]
arguments.description: number of triangle subdivisions along the y

doc.name: torus
